metadata.inclusion:
1. Open the cover by removing the bottom fixing screw
2. Insert the battery in the battery compartment
3. Press the Function Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds
4. Reattach the cover and tighten the fixing screw
metadata.exclusion: Press the Function Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The Water Leak Sensor will be removed from the Z-Wave network.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the Function Button for 10 seconds.
